item.title: The Best Open-World Zombie Games Ever Made
item.description: There are lots of great zombie games on offer these days. Some take the form of linear action games or first-person rail-shooters, but an increasing number of zombie game developers are looking toward the open-world genre for inspiration on how to keep their players engaged. Here's a few of our favorites.

item.title: Pokemon Pocket: Best Golem Counters
item.description:
Summary

  • Mankey + Primeape disrupt Golem's protection by targeting Druddigon early, leaving it vulnerable, with evolved Primeape dealing significant damage.
  • Venusaur ex + Exeggutor ex exploit Golem's Grass-type weakness, allowing Venusaur ex to endure and defeat Golem in two turns with effective damage output.
  • Zebstrika + Raichu disrupt Golem's slow evolution by sniping Bench Pokemon, neutralizing Golem lineups before they can enter the Active Spot.

The new Golem from Pokemon Pocket ’s Mythical Island set has proven to be a powerful card, especially when paired with top Fighting-types like Marshadow and Hitmonlee. The addition of Druddigon to Golem’s lineup completed the puzzle, creating a dominant deck that ruled most Pokemon TCG Pocket tournaments for a while. While Golem’s popularity is slowly waning in the META, many players are seeking the best counters. Currently, most Golem decks are incredibly strong and tanky against top-tier lineups. But here’s a list of the most effective counter duos for Golem based on recent metagame trends.

6 Mankey + Primeape

This Duo Kills Golem’s Kingmaker

Mankey and Primeape may not be a direct counter to Golem, but they can effectively target a key card in Golem decks: Druddigon. One of the reasons Golem rose in the META was the protection Druddigon provided, allowing it to build up slowly without being interrupted. The Mankey-Primeape duo can disrupt this protection early, leaving Golem vulnerable.

Here’s how the duo works: Mankey attacks Druddigon, absorbing the 20 damage it returns. The next turn, Mankey evolves into Primeape, which is now in revenge mode and deals 100 damage to Druddigon. For those unfamiliar, Primeape deals an additional 60 damage when it’s hurt, and since Druddigon always retaliates, this buff is guaranteed to trigger.

The Mankey + Primeape combo mentioned here refers to the Genetic Apex variants of the cards. The new Primeape from the Mythical Island mini-set does not have the revenge buff.

5 Venusaur ex + Exeggutor ex

An Underrated Pair for Exploiting Golem’s Weakness

Golem is weak to Grass-type, which is well-known. However, Pokemon Pocket’s current META lacks a strong Grass lineup to counter Golem—except for the Venusaur ex and Exeggutor ex duo. With this combo, players can tank damage and deal solid damage in return.

Venusaur ex, in particular, can withstand two Golem attacks while hitting back for 180 damage. Here's the math: Venusaur ex’s HP is 190, and it heals 30 damage, effectively reducing Golem’s ATK to 90 instead of 120. Venusaur ex’s base damage is 100, which should drop to 70 because of Golem’s protection. But since Golem is weak to Grass-type, it’s counted as 90 per attack—180 total. In two turns, Venusaur ex can endure and defeat Golem.

4 Zebstrika + Raichu

A META Combo for AoE and Sniping

Golem is a slow-build Pokemon, meaning its basic and Stage One forms, Geodude and Graveler, will sit on the Bench for a while. This weakness presents a perfect disruption opportunity: players can drop Zebstrika early to snipe Golem’s Evolution line before it’s ready. Zebstrika’s primary move allows it to target any of the enemy’s Pokemon and deal 30 damage. This lets it chip away at Golem’s HP by damaging Geodude and Graveler, a lifesaver in late-game rounds.

Once Zebstrika’s done with Golem’s Bench, Raichu enters the scene. The new Raichu from the Mythical Island set deals 60 damage to the enemy’s active Pokemon and 20 damage to each of their Benched Pokemon. Combined with Zebstrika’s sniping ability, Raichu can effectively neutralize Golem lineups before they can leave the Bench.

3 Greninja + Gyarados ex

Chipping Away the Beast’s HP

Gyarados ex is already one of the top META cards in Pokemon Pocket , and it performs equally well against all Fighting-type decks, including Golem setups. Judging by Gyarados ex’s total damage output of 140 per shot, one might think that Golem holds the advantage, especially since Golem reduces incoming damage by 30, lowering Gyarados ex’s output to 110. But that’s not what happens in their matchups.

Gyarados ex is empowered by Greninja, a stealthy Pokemon that starts chipping away at Geodude and Graveler’s HP before they even evolve into Golem. As a result, the Golem that eventually enters the Active Spot typically has less than 160 HP, often within the range of Gyarados ex’s debuffed damage. By the time Golem leaves the Bench, the Greninja and Gyarados ex duo will be ready to take it out in one shot.

2 Mew ex + Mewtwo ex

The Anti-Golem Mirroring Combo

Pokemon Pocket ’s metagame is largely dominated by Mewtwo ex, and Mew ex has been boosting its power with tech support. Currently, the Mewtwo ex and Mew ex combo is one of the most consistent ways to take down Golem decks. Players can either use Giovanni on Mewtwo ex to deal 130 damage, knocking out Golem in two turns, or copy Golem’s Guard Press with Mew ex, which deals a massive 90 damage. (The latter strategy, using Mew ex against Golem, is a bit tricky since it requires retreating Mew ex with Budding Expeditioner. Without this, Golem might gain the upper hand and destroy Mew ex first.)

1 Hitmonlee + Aerodactyl ex

A Bench-Sniping Combo to Disrupt Golem’s Evolution

Golem’s best counter that's been gaining popularity is Hitmonlee. This newly appreciated Pokemon has all the features an S-tier tech card needs: 1) It’s a Basic Pokemon, making it easy to draw; 2) It attacks with one Energy, making it easy to set up; and 3) Its retreat cost is only one, allowing for easy swaps. What makes Hitmonlee especially effective against Golem is its Bench-inflicted damage.

Hitmonlee can deal 30 damage to one of the opponent’s Benched Pokemon, which, in the case of Golem, will be either Geodude or Graveler. When paired with Aerodactyl ex, Hitmonlee becomes even more disruptive, forcing the enemy to evolve on the Bench. Additionally, Hitmonlee is often teamed up with Marshadow, the new Fighting-type star, which can strengthen the counter lineup and potentially one-shot the enemy’s pre-Golem plays.

item.title: Rumor: Marvel Rivals Could Be Hinting at Colossus
item.description:
Summary

  • Missing text in Fastball Special team-up ability hints at possible arrival of Colossus.
  • Fans speculate on potential new heroes.
  • Excitement grows over rumored team-ups between future heroes.

A recent video by a popular Marvel Rivals streamer pointed out missing text within the game's description of the team-up ability Fastball Special, leading some players to believe NetEase Games is hinting at the arrival of Colossus. Marvel Rivals is currently nearing the end of Season 0, and the community is eagerly awaiting the arrival of Season 1. While very little is known about the upcoming season, many fans are expecting to see new characters, maps, and even game modes.

Fastball Special is currently a team-up ability between Wolverine and Hulk in Marvel Rivals . The special move requires that both characters confirm the team-up. Once triggered, Hulk picks up Wolverine and can throw him in any direction, allowing the mutant to close the gap between himself and nearby enemies. Many fans are eager to see more X-Men come to the game, with some asking for a Marvel Rivals team-up between Wolverine and Gambit inspired by the popular X-Men '97 TV show.

In a recent post on TikTok, a video by flats_ow points out that the description of the Fastball Special team-up ability says "Wolverine can interact with Hulk or." There appears to be a missing name, which some fans believe could point to Colossus, as the two X-Men have used such a move in other media. While the game could certainly be hinting at the arrival of Colossus, some leakers believe Fastball Special was originally intended to be a team-up between Wolverine, Hulk, and The Thing. It has been rumored that The Thing will be a Vanguard in Marvel Rivals , which would make him similar to Hulk when considering the Fastball Special ability.

Marvel Rivals Fans Believe Wolverine’s Fastball Special Team-up Ability Hints at the Arrival of Colossus

While many characters for Marvel Rivals have been leaked by players digging through the hero shooter's files, some fans believe NetEase Games has left an intentional hint for players with a keen eye. This could be the case, but another section of the community suggests that this is just a typo within the game's text. There's no way to know for sure, but some players seem to be having fun speculating about the possibilities.

Many fans are also excited about a rumored team-up ability between Human Torch and Storm. A leaker recently revealed Human Torch's full ability kit in Marvel Rivals , revealing that he will be able to unite with Storm to create fire tornadoes on the battlefield. The leak also revealed that Human Torch will be a Duelist with the ability to create walls of flame to help control zones and hinder enemies. With Season 1 just around the corner and rumors flying around the internet, many fans are excited to see what comes next for the popular hero shooter.

item.title: Wuthering Waves - Version 2.0 All Silent Souls Can Sing Official Trailer
item.description: Wuthering Waves releases its massive 2.0 update, showcasing all of the new content, like characters and the Rinascita region, in a trailer.

item.title: Amazon Luna: Every Free Game With Prime (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Metro Exodus
  • Super Meat Boy
  • Guacamelee! 2
  • Other Amazon Luna Games That Are Free With Prime
  • Games That Have Been Free With Prime For A While
  • Luna Games That Were Previously Free With Prime

Originally revealed in 2020 and made available to a select group of people, Amazon Luna officially launched on March 1, 2022, in the United States, before expanding to the UK, Canada, and Germany. A cloud-based service, Amazon Luna offers subscribers an opportunity to stream a curated selection of games, with its library being divided into a few channels that each come with a unique monthly price.

Besides the channels, Amazon Luna also grants Prime subscribers access to a handful of free games per month; at the moment, four titles are usually the standard, although some temporary surprises might be included. Since Amazon Luna requires a stable internet connection to work, with 10 Mbps being the recommended speed, Prime owners can test the service using these titles before looking into the platform's channels. It also helps that Amazon Luna's free games for Prime lineup are generally pretty good.

These Amazon Luna's Free Games with Prime will be available between January 1–30, 2025.

Metro Exodus

Slow-paced FPS With Horror And Open-World Elements

The main attraction of Amazon Luna's free games with Prime lineup for January 2025, Metro Exodus is fantastic, although this selection's excitement is somewhat muted by the fact it has been included in previous months. Still, 4A Games' title has great deliberate gunplay that complements a horror tone and intense post-apocalyptic setting.

While including a couple of open areas that encourage exploration, the campaign is relatively linear, so it is not a complete departure from Metro 2033 and Last Light .

Super Meat Boy

One Of The Hardest Platformers Ever

Every Amazon Luna free games with Prime lineup seems to include one title that tests a user's streaming capabilities, providing newcomers an opportunity to see if the service works well for them or not. Super Meat Boy is that game for January 2025. Well-known to be one of the most challenging precision platformers of all time, Super Meat Boy is not for the faint of heart, demanding that players get their timing perfectly right if they want to conquer a level. Even the first few stages are quite difficult, and things ramp up significantly as they move along.

Guacamelee! 2

Challenging And Fun Metroidvania

A Metroidvania featuring luchador wrestlers, Guacamelee! 2 is an absolute delight that has great visuals, a quirky sense of humor, and tight gameplay. While platforming is a big part of the equation, combat is also emphasized and has depth, making this 2018 release a great pick for anyone craving an action-packed adventure. With impeccable controls, vibrant environments, and memorable characters, Guacamelee! 2 is just an all-around impressive package that is perfect for Metroidvania veterans or rookies.

Other Amazon Luna Games That Are Free With Prime

Airhead & The Magical Mixture Mill

The following games are also part of Amazon Luna's Free with Prime lineup for January 2025.

Game

Genre

Developer

Airhead

Action-Adventure Metroidvania

Octato, Massive Miniteam

The Magical Mixture Mill

Management, Life Sim, Fantasy

Glowlight

Games That Have Been Free With Prime For A While

Fallout: New Vegas

Fallout: New Vegas is generally regarded as the high point of the 3D era, at least when it comes to pure role-playing. Obsidian crafted a player-driven campaign that provides plenty of freedom in crafting the Courier's identity and directing his journey through the eponymous city.

Now, New Vegas is quite old by this point, and it was always rather rough around the edges. On PC, the game has a lively modding community that has not only kept it alive but also improved the vanilla content; unfortunately, mods are not an option on Amazon Luna. Still, if someone wants to try out the base version, this freebie should be great.

Fallout 3: Game Of The Year Edition

Considering its accessibility and longevity, Fallout 3 has likely been experienced by anyone who has ever been remotely interested in it. Nevertheless, the 2008 RPG will always be a big deal in its own right, and it is still fun to play all these years later. At the time, Bethesda's shift to a 3D sandbox open-world marked a significant departure from previous Fallout entries, and this decision helped propel the series to new commercial heights.

Nowadays, the standard version of Fallout 3 is antiquated in quite a few areas. The gameplay was never particularly good and has not gotten better with age. While not quite as action-driven as Fallout 4 , the 2008 release does not emphasize player choices as much as New Vegas or the series' isometric releases; however, Fallout 3 still offers solid customization and an awesome playground.

Trackmania Starter Access

Ubisoft's most recent Trackmania project has been around for a couple of years, although it only launched on most platforms in 2023. Unlike most racing games, Trackmania prioritizes time trials and short tracks, with most laps lasting only a small handful of minutes. Although incorporating an online aspect, players will also be competing against themselves as they try to shave a second or two from their best times.

Trackmania is a free-to-play game that only provides a sample of content in its base version. The Starter Access iteration is a bit more robust and should keep people engaged for a while.

Fortnite is also part of Amazon Luna's free games with Prime, along with its spin-off modes like Lego Fortnite Brick Life , Rocket Racing , Fortnite Ballistic , and Fortnite Festival ​​​​​​.

Luna Games That Were Previously Free With Prime

This section maintains a record of all the Amazon Luna games that have been free with Prime since the service's launch on March 1, 2022. These upcoming Amazon Luna games have been free with Prime:
